availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas P. Cain (Louisville, Jefferson County, dry goods merchant)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, dry goods merchant. Pennsylvania native. Married to Eliza Cain. Father of James Cain and Mary Cain. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1860. Partner with Thomas Slevin and Richard D. Slevin in T. & R. Slevin & Cain in Jefferson County in 1861. Employed Margrett S. in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 251.
